messages:
Your words
mean nothing

when your actions
are the complete opposite.
I was blind, but now I can see 🙏🙏 #Faith

Your words
mean nothing

when your actions
are the complete opposite.
I was blind, but now I can see 🙏🙏 #Faith
Those who stuck with me through the storm, understand there's a genuine pain behind the words I'm saying & they embrace me so i thank you.
It's crazy how time flys by so fast, though the pain I felt then still longs in my heart. Though it's not what I want, life goes on.

Your words
mean nothing

when your actions
are the complete opposite.
I was blind, but now I can see 🙏🙏 #Faith
